entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. A mix of sun and cloud late this afternoon with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023
